title: Mike Abou-Mechrek
text: Mike Abou-Mechrek (born October 14, 1975) is a former professional <a href="Canadian%20football">Canadian football</a> <a href="offensive%20linemen">offensive linemen</a>. He played <a href="CIS%20Football">CIS Football</a> for the <a href="Western%20Ontario%20Mustangs">Western Ontario Mustangs</a>.
